welcome: 👋 Assalomu alaykum! Kodni kiriting va kerakli videoni oling!
help_text:
🤖 Botdan foydalanish:

1️⃣ Kodni kiriting (masalan: 123)
2️⃣ Agar mavjud bo‘lsa, sizga video yuboriladi
3️⃣ Kod topilmasa, 'Video topilmadi' degan xabar chiqadi

Agar qo‘shimcha yordam kerak bo‘lsa, pastdagi 'Admin bilan bog‘lanish' tugmasini bosing.
video_not_found: 😕 Afsuski, bu kod bo‘yicha video topilmadi.
